~~~~~~Twister~~~~~~


*Twister looks at Dracona*

Twister: Hi....Anything n=
ew?

*Twister asks Dracona while looking at the wall*
  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, Augu=
st 01, 2000 3:35 AM
  Subject: Re: The End Is Near.........................=
..........................


  Dracona walks over to Twister.

  "Hello." D=
racona said dryly...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: iloveallli=
zards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, August 01, 2000 1:56 =
AM
    Subject: Re: The End Is Near........................................=
...........


    ~~~~~~~~~~Infectra/Twister~~~~~~~~~~
     
     
    *Inf=
ectra frowns and puts her arms around Airbomber. Mech tears weld up in Infe=
ctra's optics*



    *Twister sits at the same table and just sits there a=
nd than her head rises with her optics not blinking a bit*

    Twister:...=
....alone........

    *Twister whispers to herself*
      ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent=
: Tuesday, August 01, 2000 1:31 AM
      Subject: The End Is Near..........=
.........................................


      Plintissa and Artist look=
 at each other sadly. Why would Dracona do this? She couldn't be reprogramm=
ed, she had a device that could prevent it. Plintissa knew that her only fr=
iend was against her.

      "Artist, we have to go back and try to convinc=
e Dracona." Plintissa said.

      "I agree, we must face danger, and not f=
lee. Oops." Artist said. Plintissa snickered.

      "It's okay, Artist, if=
 you have to rhyme, then rhyme." Plintissa said. Artist smiled and both of =
them returned to Team Ultima's base.

      Dracona looked to Train Wreck.
=

      "YOU! What are you doing?" Dracona yelled. Train Wreck smiled.

    =
  "Stealing your equipment, what does it look like?" Train Wreck said. Drac=
ona growled.

      "I thought I reprogrammed you!" Dracona said.

      "Y=
eah? I used your own invention against you! And I used it on my friends, to=
o!" Train Wreck said. Arrow stepped up by Train Wreck. They both looked at =
Blender and Stronghold. B;ender walks up. Stronghold does. Stronghold reach=
es out and grabs Train Wreck, forcing him down and sticking a rifle to the =
back of his head. Blender grabs Arrow and drags him down as well.

      "S=
orry old friends, but Dracona's deal is a BETTER deal!" Blender said.

    =
  "Outside, I don't want any blood in the base."  Dracona said. Train Wreck=
 and Arrow were drug outside. Train Wreck suddenly lurched out and hit Blen=
der. Stronghold was hit by Arrow, who had escaped. Stronghold and Blender c=
hased Arrow and Train Wreck into the jungle. Stronghold struggles with Trai=
n Wreck. Arrow is hit so hard by Blender he is put into stasis lock. Train =
Wreck is beat senseless by both of S.A.B. Inc. (Stronghold and Blender Inco=
mpany.) Train Wreck tries all of his submissions but Stronghold and Blender=
 always save each other. Train Wreck is held in the air by Stronghold. Blen=
der laughs. Train Wreck is almost dead, his mech fluid is flooding the jung=
le and is almost drowning Arrow. Blender pops a spinning saw blade from his=
 forearm and slams it through Train Wreck. Stronghold drops Train Wreck and=
 laughs. Blender reaches down and snaps Train Wreck's neck. Blender and Str=
onghold bow to each other and turn to Arrow. Arrow wakes up for a few secon=
ds and looks at them.

      "Wha?" Arrow asks. Stronghold reaches out and =
looks into a hole. He sweeps all of Train Wreck's mech fluid into it.

    =
  "Sayonara ass!" Blender said. Stronghold jumps into the pit of mech fluid=
 and sticks Arrow's head under. Arrow finally stops struggling. Stronghold =
drops Arrow and Blender kicks him. They both laugh and walk back towards Te=
am Ultima base. They both take out cigars and smoke them in satisfaction of=
 their acompishments.

      Stranato suddenly grabs his chest in pain. Air=
bomber stares at him. Stranato suddenly starts changing form. Stranato now =
looks a little different. Airbomber screams and is also slightly morphed.

=
      "What does this mean?" Airbomber asked Stranato.

      "It means tha=
t...Train Wreck and Arrow are dead. I can feel it." Stranato said.

      "=
What? How?" Airbomber said desperatley.

      "It appears our plan didn't =
work out." Stranato said.

      "Plan?" Airbomber replies.

      "Yes, no=
ne of the Radiocns were reprogrammed really." Stranato replied sadly.

    =
  "Then why are Train Wreck and Arrow dead?" Airbomber asked.

      "They =
were killed...by Stronghold and Blender." Stranato replied sadly.

      "W=
HAT! Our friends killed out friends!?!?!?!?" Airbomber said.

      "Sadly,=
 yes, they betrayed us, but out friends, now live on in us." Stranato said.=


      "Huh?" Airbomber questioned.

      "Their sparks joined in with ou=
rs, we now posses their power, the Radicons are no more, let us say goodbye=
 to our good friends as their spiritual sparks head toward the Matrix. Airb=
omber and Stranato stood in silence, saluting Arrow and Train Wreck. Airbom=
ber puts his arm around Infectra and cries. Stranato also cannot keep chara=
cter, and is crying as well.

      Gangon starts to fade away, realizing h=
e isn't wanted anymore.
       
      Lightmare's spark floats slowly towar=
d the Matrix, unsure if she wants to go there. Arrow and Train Wreck's spar=
ks come by. Lightmare's spark notices them. The former Radicons floated int=
o the Matrix. Lightmare's spark lit up and followed them.

      Deemos and=
 Inzoola sit there VERY bored. They couldn't believe that nobody was paying=
 attention to them!

      "I don't believe this, how can they treat me lik=
e this!?" Deemos yelled.

      "If your bored, we could always go find a s=
pot and...be alone." Inzola said. Deemos just stared coldly. Inzola frowned=
, she knew Deemos felt unimportant, but right now he was making her feel pr=
etty unimportant, too!

      Sinesis is still healing up in the CR Chamber=
 of Team Ultima base.

      Dracona calls Zardus on her comm unit.

      =
"Zardus, this is former Alliance warrior Dracona, I wish to make...an Allia=
nce with the Alliance." She said.

      Plintissa noticed Stronghold and B=
lender, she and Artist slowly sneaking up behind them.

      Sinister is "=
Alone" with Blizzard...

--------------------------------------------------=
----------------------------



-------------------------------------------=
-----------------------------------
